Please make your way to the nearest exit. https : / / t. co / U5S24qzchL pic. twitter. com / lhGRsJGBW5 — Lollapalooza ( @ lollapalooza ) August 4, 2017 Mass, soaking wet exodus from @ lollapalooza as storm moves in over Grant Park @ abc7chicago pic. twitter. com / EwuOyLnRAu — liz nagy ( @ liznagy ) August 4, 2017 Lollapalooza organizers evacuated Grant Park just after 9 p. m. on the first day of the music festival due to weather, bringing the festival's first day of performances to
